typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(MovieID = toInteger(byName('movie')),
		MovieTitle = byName('title'),
		MovieYearReleased = toInteger(byName('year')),
		MovieRating = toInteger(byName('Rating')),
		MoviePrimaryGenre = byName('genres')) ~> BuildModel
BuildModel aggregate(groupBy(MovieYearReleased),
	AverageRating = avg(MovieRating)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1
